title: Why cold approach is de*d
description:
Watch The Full Thing Here : 
————————————————————
Ready to build a network of amazing women and high-status men?

Michael’s Men of Action is a one-on-one Master’s program that teaches men how to create elite 
social lives by becoming higher status.

Click this link to learn how you can have a High-Status lifestyle now:
https://m.moamentoring.com/podcast

Click here to join the Men of Action community and watch the High-Status Networking 101 course:
https://m.moamentoring.com/moa-community

Interested in joining the Men of Action sales team? Apply here:
https://www.moamentoring.com/jobs/sales

Men of Action has an affiliate program! Post pre-made content and get paid passively:
https://www.moamentoring.com/affiliate
————————————————————

Subscribe on Youtube: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/MichaelSartain

Listen on Apple Podcast: 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-michael-sartain-podcast/id1579791157

Listen on Spotify:

channel_info.title: Michael Sartain
channel_info.description:
🎙Host of The Michael Sartain Podcast 

🔥Teaching you how to build a network of desirable women and high-status men

👇 Click the "Men of Action" link below now to forge a high-status lifestyle and join the elites

transcription: {"text": "Just ask 10 hot girls how they met the last five guys they f***ed and they're just all going to tell you what I've been saying. All of them. Look, none of them are going to say, yeah, a guy walked up to me in a bar and then picked me up. None of them. They're all going to tell you that the last five guys they slept with is like, my friend introduced me, my friend introduced me, he slid into my DMs, my friend introduced me, I slid into his DMs, a guy introduced me, I met him at an event. They're all going to tell you that. In sales, what do we do? When we keep having a certain type of guy by our course, then we start targeting that guy. It makes a lot of sense in sales, but for some reason, when it comes to talking to women, we don't seem to want to do the same thing. If client acquisition keeps coming from organic, then we need to make our organic better. If client acquisition keeps coming from paid ads, then we improve paid ads. But if dating beautiful women keeps coming from women introducing you, then why don't you have more female friends? How does this not make sense to people? It's just so obvious. You just take sales and networking and you just slide it into dating and it matches perfectly.
